title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
excerpt: A deep dive into one of JavaScript's most powerful concepts - closures.
content: Closures are functions that remember their lexical environment even when they are executed outside of it. This allows for powerful patterns in JavaScript, such as data encapsulation and module creation...
